newsitem.title: USA: Game Financial wins Fla. casino contract.
newsitem.headline: Game Financial wins Fla. casino contract.

text.p: Game Financial Corp said Wednesday it has received a contract to provide three of its GameCash services at the Hollywood Seminole Casino located in Hollywood, Fla.

Game Financial, which provides casinos with services that allow customers to access cash using credit cards, checks and automated teller machines, said this will be one of the company's largest accounts.
The casino is owned and operated by the Seminole Tribe of Florida and has about 500 gaming machines and a bingo hall. The company's services should be operational in May 1997.
Shares of Game Financial were trading up 3/8 to 7-1/8.
